history: TTS <speak> Welcome to CMU GetGoing <break time='1s' />.
TTS <speak> How would you like to travel today? <break strength='strong'/> I can give you public transit directions or driving directions. </speak>
USER If I could take the bus.
TTS <speak> Great! <break strength='strong' /> I will provide you with directions to your destination by public transit. <break time='800ms'/> </speak>
TTS Where do you want to go?
USER I want to go to the airport.
TTS Did you say that you wanted to go to pittsburgh international airport?
USER Yes.
TTS Where are you leaving from?
USER Yes.
TTS Where would you like to leave from?
USER I'd like to leave from Carnegie Mellon.
TTS Did you say that you were leaving from carnegie mellon university?
USER Yes, I did.
TTS When would you like to travel?
USER the next bus
TTS Okay, travelling at 12:28 pm.
TTS <speak> Would you like me to pause after every step to give you time to write things down? </speak>
USER No, thanks.

TTS <speak> Ok, great! <break strength='strong' /> I will pause after every step and give you time to write things down. <break strength='strong' /> Feel free to ask me to repeat a step, <break strength='weak' /> if you didn't catch it the first time. </speak>
TTS <speak> Hold on. I'll look up the directions. </speak>
USER yes

TTS <speak> <break time='800ms'/> There are 4 available routes, to hear a different route say ALTERNATE ROUTE. The amount of time your trip will take is approximately 1 hour 13 minutes, and you will take 1 bus.<break time='800ms'/> The first thing that you want to do <break strength='weak'/> is to Walk for about 3 mins to <break strength='weak'/> <prosody volume='loud'> Forbes avenue at Morewood avenue far side . </prosody> </speak>
TTS <speak> <break time='800ms'/> Let me know when you're done writing. </speak>
USER If I took this right now, but get home, okay.
TTS <speak> Next, <break strength='weak'/> you should Walk for about 3 mins to <break strength='weak'/> <prosody volume='loud'> Forbes avenue at Morewood avenue far side . </prosody> </speak>
TTS <speak> <break time='800ms'/> Please tell me when it's ok to continue. </speak>
USER continue

TTS <speak> The final step <break strength='weak'/> is to Take the <break strength='weak'/> <prosody volume='loud'> 28X <break strength='weak'/> to </prosody> <break strength='weak'/> <prosody volume='loud'> Pittsburgh International airport lower level.</prosody> It will depart at <break strength='weak'/> <prosody volume='loud'> 12:55pm. </prosody> </speak>
TTS <speak> <break time='800ms'/> Please tell me when it's ok to continue. </speak>
USER It's okay.
TTS <speak> </speak>
TTS <speak> Would you like to hear an alternate route?</speak>
